title: Paathu Paathu Lyrics Manja Pai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Paathu Paathu
Singer: Hariharasudhan , Vandana Srinivasan
Movie: Manja Pai
Music: N.R. Raghunanthan
Lyricist: Yugabharathi

Paathu Paathu unna paathu
vaanam kuttaiyaachu.
Poothu poothu kannum poothu
boomi thattayaachu.

Unna paathu thaaney
nizhalum vellai aachu.
Aasa koodi poga
anilum singam aachu.

Thaali seyya sollu neeyum
thevayilla vetti pechu .

Paathu Paathu unna paathu
vaanam kuttaiyaachu.
Poothu poothu kannum poothu
boomi thattayaachu.

Kozhi rekka unna paarthu
vaanavillu aanen.
Konja neram unna pesi
kannadhaasan aanen.

Kooda pandhu neeyum theenda
boomi pandhu aanen.
Kooru kaththi kangalaala
oodhupathi aanen.

Noolu gandu unnaal, koli gundu aanen.
Paadha mannu yeno, poosum manjal aanen.
Jodiyaaga neeyum sera
pattu poochi pattam aanen.

Paathu Paathu unna paathu
vaanam kuttaiyaachu.
Poothu poothu kannum poothu
boomi thattayaachu.

Nethu unna paartha pinbu
thoogalaanu ponen.
Kanavil neeyum thurathi adikka
thorthuthaana ponen.

Thothu neeyum podurenu
kobamaagi ponen.
konjidaama poniyenu
saapudaama ponen.

Unna ennai naaney, olliyaagi ponen.
pulli neeyum vaikka kolamaagi ponen.
Koodu vittu koodu paaya
khokku maakku aagi ponen.

Paathu Paathu unna paathu
vaanam kuttaiyaachu.
Poothu poothu kannum poothu
boomi thattayaachu.

Unna paathu thaaney
nizhalum vellai aachu.
Aasa koodi poga
anilum singam aachu.

Thaali seyya sollu neeyum
thevayilla vetti pechu .
